ChunkText: students must have cpt approval before beginning work. cpt start and end dates are based on the umbc academic calendar. isss cannot approve dates earlier than the day after the last day of class for that specific term. students are expected to attend the last day of class and finish all their coursework before beginning work for the next term.
ContextBefore: cpt approval is granted per semester if a position continues to the next semester, students will need to request cpt again for the next term. students are eligible to start working from the date they are approved by isss. isss cannot approve cpt for dates that have passed. please plan ahead and apply early!
ContextAfter: before you start: cpt checklist required materials: upload a copy of your job offer letter request recommendations from your academic advisors undergraduate students only need a recommendation from their academic advisor. graduate students need a recommendation from both their academic advisor and graduate program director.
